text:
Dr, Harry J. Skornia
Page 2
But here is where there is a difference, or differences in under¬
standings, And, it*e none of my business, but I’ll give you ray
personal interpretations. Either you have the wrong picture, in
part, or he has the wrong picture, in part, or someone hasn1t
told both of you the same stories, Elmer*s impression is that
you*11 go back to speech, Your letter didn’t seem to indicate
that, That’s that.
NAEB had a good meeting in Minneapolis last week. New officers
are Gray&on Ausmus, Alabama, president; Burton Paulu, Minnesota,
vice president; Jim Miles, Purdue, secretary; and Frank Sohooley,
Illinois, treasurer,
I understand that the University of Washington is looking for
someone to head up the Communications division there, Guy must
have broad communications background, presumably including both
radio and Journalism, You might be interested,
Schooley family fine, except Eleanor’s mother at 73 in hospital
with appendectomy. Trust Skornlas as fine.
Regards,
FES:es
Frank E. Sohooley
Treasurer
